PSCT.Base: Activate this card by placing 7 counters on it. Each time an "Ursarctic" monster(s) is Special Summoned from the hand or Extra Deck: You can remove 1 counter from this card; draw 1 card. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can target 1 "Ursarctic" card in your GY, except "Ursarctic Radiation"; shuffle it into the Deck. You can only control 1 "Ursarctic Radiation".
